title: Riot Support Ticket Status
body: I was wondering what the "Status" of a ticket is in Riot Support. Mine says that it's open. What does that mean and what kinds of other "Statuses" are there?

replies.body: Open means that you can freely communicate with your Specialist.  Solved doesn't mean a lot, just that a response was sent back from a specialist.  Closed would be that the ticket is permanently closed, so you would have to create another ticket.  Let me know if that clears things up!
my ticket says hold what does it mean?

Same for me, please answer me aswell seperately (just copypaste should be enough tho) so I get the notification. 

I'm mildly confused because the ticket said **Open** for some time yesterday, and I didn't ask anything new becuase the ticket is already long as is, thinking the response is in work. Now it's on **Hold** again.
Thanks for my reply! Someone actually responded to and fixed my issue, but that's helpful if I submit another ticket :)
